perturbation.original_text: This Broker Dealer Marketing and Servicing Agreement for Variable Annuity Contracts (the "Agreement") is effective this ______ day of ________________, 2013, by and among Principal Life Insurance Company ("Issuer") and Princor Financial Services Corporation ("Distributor"), on the one hand, and _______________________ and its duly licensed insurance affiliates indicated on the signature page of this Agreement, if any, (collectively "Broker Dealer"), on the other hand. Distributor, Issuer and Broker Dealer are individually referred to as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties"
perturbation.changed_text: This Broker Dealer Marketing and Servicing Agreement for Variable Annuity Contracts (the "Agreement") is effective this ______ day of ________________, 2013, by and among Principal Life Insurance Company ("Issuer") and Princor Financial Services Corporation ("Distributor"), on the one hand, and _______________________ and its duly licensed insurance affiliates indicated on the signature page of this Agreement, if any, (collectively "Broker"), on the other hand. Distributor, Issuer and Broker are individually referred to as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties"
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Broker Dealer' is changed to 'Broker.' This creates confusion as the agreement uses both terms interchangeably without clarifying if they refer to the same entity. This could lead to uncertainty in obligations if specific duties are assigned to 'Broker Dealer' elsewhere, but not explicitly to 'Broker'.

perturbation.original_text: Compensation shall only be paid to Broker Dealer of record on premiums paid to and retained by Issuer while this Agreement is in force. Broker Dealer agrees to pay a commission to Registered Representatives in connection with the sales or servicing of Annuity Contracts under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Compensation shall only be paid to Broker of record on premiums paid to and retained by Issuer while this Agreement is in force. Intermediary agrees to pay a commission to Registered Representatives in connection with the sales or servicing of Annuity Contracts under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Broker Dealer' is changed to 'Broker' in the first sentence and to 'Intermediary' in the second sentence. This introduces uncertainty as to which entity is responsible for receiving compensation and which entity is responsible for paying commissions to registered representatives, creating a potential conflict.

perturbation.original_text: Issuer or Distributor may discontinue the issuance of any form of Annuity Contract and fix the amount of compensation on Annuity Contracts issued in exchange for previously issued Annuity Contracts.
perturbation.changed_text: Issuer or Distributor may discontinue the issuance of any form of Annuity Contract and fix the amount of compensation on Annuity Products issued in exchange for previously issued Annuity Contracts.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Annuity Contract' is changed to 'Annuity Product'. This introduces ambiguity as to whether 'Annuity Contract' and 'Annuity Product' are the same, creating potential issues in defining the scope of the agreement and the obligations related to each.
